name: Ruchi !!
wishText: To the one who's made my world better for 7 amazing years ❤️
textInChatBox: Happy birthday, Ruchi!! Wishing you endless joy, love, and beautiful memories. Thank you for being my anchor and my inspiration!
text2: I wanted to take a moment to reflect on us.
text3: Seven years have passed, and every one of them has been special.
text4: I’m so grateful for the love, laughter, and support you've given me.
text5Content: You are my happiness and my strength ❤️
